thread.title: LARUSSA/DIANA K.
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by LARUSSA/DIANA K.

author: LARUSSA/DIANA K.
title: LARUSSA/DIANA K.
text:
Enrique was excellent as my travel agent. He asked the most pertinent questions and then found me what I wanted getting me a better price option than I could have ever found. I will go to him any time I need help planning a trip whether it's in the USA or abroad.
UPDATE-I'm not sure what happened to Enrique but he hasn't returned my calls or answered my emails and I was ready to book 3 more tickets. I booked them online instead. I most likely was the cause of this disconnect because I was having back and forth dates and times for this flight so he probably just dropped me...like a rock... so he could carry on with his other customers. AND in case that wasn't the issue and he's just disappeared I hope he calls me back because I liked having less expensive flights and having him hold the tickets till I was ready to pay.
